channel.title: Summon-Pkz Client V7 Project - Updated Every day
channel.description:
[i]I have now started to work on my 7th Client, done ALOT in the past Two/three days on it. I am using the CSK Client V1 as a base, which is S W A T's first client. I am using this as a base, because It is plain, and Old, which Means I can add my own thing's into it instead of bulding ontop of other people's creations. SWAT'S first client Is basically blank, apart from Sprites, and skillcapes, there is nothing else. I decided to Make A 7th Client because People had problems with my last one, And I want to make A Perfect client for My server, So I Can concentrate on My server rather than client once I have finished Everything on my client.[/i] ¤¤ [u][b]Client Development - Will Update EVERY day[/b][/u] ¤¤ 25th October 2008:
- Added 'Buy X', and also Added the Server side Stuff to make it work. - Advanced my Login box. - Not had much time today, been out.
24th October 2008:
- Advanced my lunar interface from Previous client (V6.5), and added To V7 (Picture below). - Switched GameFrame back to 474, 503 one was bugging up. - Working on Custom Ancient & Modern Magic sprites.
23rd October 2008:
- Added JFrame and JMenu's, such as Website's, Server IP changer etc. - Added Client Flames, and BackGround to go with flames. - Made a Custom Login Box, Took me HOURS to get the outside of it to Match with the BackGround because there was a white box around the Login box. - Added More advanced custom LogIn buttons. - Updated GameFrame.
22nd October 2008:
- Allowed Login Boxes and Buttons to be added & added some basic ones in the sprites folder. - Added SkillCape Master NPC's. - Added a few GFX's that are relevant to My Server side work.
21'st October 2008:
- Made fixup of sprites, Plus allowed the client to edit the MapBack. - Added Logout door, replaced sprite of Normal door with Clan Chat Icon. - Replaced Method264 in class23, so GFX's can be added to the client. - Added a few Item's.
[u][b]PICTURES[/b][/u] [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Client-2.jpg[/img] GameFrame: [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Gframe.jpg[/img] Lunar: [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/lunar.jpg[/img]

item.title: Summon-Pkz Client V7 Project - Updated Every day
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:1, topic:238499”][i]I have now started to work on my 7th Client, done ALOT in the past Two/three days on it. I am using the CSK Client V1 as a base, which is S W A T’s first client. I am using this as a base, because It is plain, and Old, which Means I can add my own thing’s into it instead of bulding ontop of other people’s creations. SWAT’S first client Is basically blank, apart from Sprites, and skillcapes, there is nothing else.

I decided to Make A 7th Client because People had problems with my last one, And I want to make A Perfect client for My server, So I Can concentrate on My server rather than client once I have finished Everything on my client.[/i]

¤¤ Client Development - Will Update EVERY day ¤¤

25th October 2008:

[quote] - Added ‘Buy X’, and also Added the Server side Stuff to make it work.

  • Advanced my Login box.
  • Not had much time today, been out.[/quote]

24th October 2008:

[quote] - Advanced my lunar interface from Previous client (V6.5), and added To V7 (Picture below).

  • Switched GameFrame back to 474, 503 one was bugging up.
  • Working on Custom Ancient & Modern Magic sprites.[/quote]

23rd October 2008:

[quote] - Added JFrame and JMenu’s, such as Website’s, Server IP changer etc.

  • Added Client Flames, and BackGround to go with flames.
  • Made a Custom Login Box, Took me HOURS to get the outside of it to Match with the BackGround because there was a white box around the Login box.
  • Added More advanced custom LogIn buttons.
  • Updated GameFrame.[/quote]

22nd October 2008:

[quote] - Allowed Login Boxes and Buttons to be added & added some basic ones in the sprites folder.

  • Added SkillCape Master NPC’s.
  • Added a few GFX’s that are relevant to My Server side work.[/quote]

21’st October 2008:

[quote] - Made fixup of sprites, Plus allowed the client to edit the MapBack.

  • Added Logout door, replaced sprite of Normal door with Clan Chat Icon.
  • Replaced Method264 in class23, so GFX’s can be added to the client.
  • Added a few Item’s.[/quote]

PICTURES

Client-2.jpg775×558

GameFrame:

Gframe.jpg764×503

Lunar:

lunar.jpg773×558
[/quote]

Looks nice, You’re about as far as I was 2 months ago when I quit 317’s ^^

item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:5, topic:238499”]Perhaps move buttons around.

It looks alright, but do more then just Jframes, Sprites and Button Positions. (pl0x)[/quote]

I’ve only been working on this for 3 days, And I’ve only been adding the Core Things, Such as Enabling the uses Of Custom GFX’s and NPC’s, Custom sprites, Interfaces, Clicking area’s etc, so I don’t have to add them later, and I can concentrate more on the Most important thing’s that I plan to do.
